# Copilot Instructions for Schedule Maker Timefoldsolver

This is a Java Maven project for schedule making with Timefoldsolver.

## Project Setup

- [x] copilot-instructions.md file created in .github directory
- [x] Scaffolded Java project with Maven
- [x] Main application class created at src/main/java/com/example/App.java
- [x] Test class created at src/test/java/com/example/AppTest.java
- [x] README.md with project information and build instructions

## Build Instructions

The project uses Maven for building. To compile:

```bash
mvn clean compile
```

## Running the Application

To run the application:

```bash
mvn exec:java -Dexec.mainClass="com.example.App"
```

## Running Tests

To run unit tests:

```bash
mvn test
```

## Debugging

To debug the application, you can use VS Code's Debug configuration or run Maven with debug flags:

```bash
mvn -X clean compile
```
